newsitem.title: USA: Apple's Claris unit Q4 revs $56.6 mln.
newsitem.headline: Apple's Claris unit Q4 revs $56.6 mln.

text.p: Apple Computer Inc's software subsidiary Claris Corp said on Tuesday its fiscal fourth quarter revenues were $56.6 million, and revenues for the full year rose to $236.2 million from $166.6 million in fiscal 1995.
Claris cited strong sales of Apple-brand software for the rise in annual revenues.
It said other products, such as Claris Home Page, software for creating World Wide Web pages, first shipped in August and had strong fourth quarter sales.
New Japanese versions of ClarisWorks and ClarisImpact graphics software shipped in the fourth quarter and also added to sales, it said.
Claris did not provide a figure for 1995 fourth quarter revenues.
